Cannon.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
Cannon.ability: Attack: After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all %CRIT% results to %HIT% results.

Cannon.name: Ion Cannon
Cannon.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 %HIT% or %CRIT% result to cause the defender to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. All remaining %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

Cannon.name: Jamming Beam
Cannon.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

Cannon.name: Tractor Beam
Cannon.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

Configuration.name: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout
Configuration.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform %TORPEDO% and %MISSILE% attacks against targets you have locked. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during the attack.%LINEBREAK%Add %TORPEDO% and %MISSILE% slots.

Configuration.name: Xg-1 Assault Configuration
Configuration.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform %CANNON% attacks. While you perform a %CANNON% attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 3 attack dice.%LINEBREAK%Add %CANNON% slot.

Configuration.name: Pivot Wing
Configuration.ability: Closed: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die.%LINEBREAK%After you execute a [0 %STOP%] maneuver, you may rotate your ship 90º or 180º.%LINEBREAK%Before you activate, you may flip this card.%LINEBREAK%Open: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

Configuration.name: Servomotor S-Foils
Configuration.ability: Closed: Adds %BOOST% , %FOCUS%  %BOOST%%LINEBREAK% While you perform a primary attack, roll 1 fewer attack die.%LINEBREAK%Before you activate, you may flip this card.%LINEBREAK%Open: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

Configuration.name: Integrated S-Foils
Configuration.ability: Closed: Adds %BARRELROLL%, %FOCUS%   %BARRELROLL%%LINEBREAK% While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is not in your %BULLSEYEARC%, roll 1 fewer attack die. %LINEBREAK% Before you activate, you may flip this card. %LINEBREAK% Open: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

Device.name: Bomblet Generator
Device.ability: Bomb%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Bomblet with the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 %CHARGE%.

Device.name: Conner Nets
Device.ability: Mine%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Conner Net using the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.%LINEBREAK%This card’s %CHARGE% cannot be recovered.

Device.name: Proton Bombs
Device.ability: Bomb%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.

Device.name: Proximity Mines
Device.ability: Mine%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.%LINEBREAK%This card’s %CHARGE% cannot be recovered.

Device.name: Seismic Charges
Device.ability: Bomb%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.

Force.name: Heightened Perception
Force.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 %FORCE%. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

Force.name: Instinctive Aim
Force.ability: While you perform a special attack, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to ignore the %FOCUS% or %LOCK% requirement.

Force.name: Sense
Force.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0-1 and look at its dial. If you spend 1 %FORCE%, you may choose a ship at range 0-3 instead.

Force.name: Supernatural Reflexes
Force.ability: Small ship only.%LINEBREAK%Before you activate, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to perform a %BARRELROLL% or %BOOST% action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1 %HIT% damage.

Force.name: Predictive Shot
Force.ability: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, you may spend 1 %FORCE%. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your %HIT%/%CRIT% results.

Force.name: Hate
Force.ability: Darkside users. After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many %FORCE%.

Illicit.name: Cloaking Device
Illicit.ability: small ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%Action: Spend 1 %CHARGE% to perform a %CLOAK% action.%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a %FOCUS% result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

Illicit.name: Contraband Cybernetics
Illicit.ability: Before you activate, you may spend 1 %CHARGE%. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

Illicit.name: Feedback Array
Illicit.ability: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1 %HIT% damage.

Illicit.name: Deadman's Switch
Illicit.ability: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 %HIT% damage.

Illicit.name: Inertial Dampeners
Illicit.ability: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0 %STOP%] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

Illicit.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
Illicit.ability: large ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%Action: Spend 1 %CHARGE%. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.

Missile.name: Cluster Missiles
Missile.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0-1 of the defender, ignoring the %LOCK% requirement.

Missile.name: Concussion Missiles
Missile.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0-1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

Missile.name: Homing Missiles
Missile.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

Missile.name: Ion Missiles
Missile.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. If this attack hits, spend 1 %HIT% or %CRIT% result to cause the defender to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. All remaining %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

Missile.name: Barrage Rockets
Missile.ability: Attack (%FOCUS%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. If the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, you may spend 1 or more %CHARGE% to reroll that many attack dice.

Sensor.name: Advanced Sensors
Sensor.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.%LINEBREAK%If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

Sensor.name: Collision Detector
Sensor.ability: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.%LINEBREAK%After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

Sensor.name: Fire-Control System
Sensor.ability: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

Sensor.name: Trajectory Simulator
Sensor.ability: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5 %STRAIGHT%] template instead.

Talent.name: Composure
Talent.ability: Requires %FOCUS% or %FOCUS%%LINEBREAK%After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a %FOCUS% action.

Talent.name: Crack Shot
Talent.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to cancel 1 %EVADE% result.

Talent.name: Daredevil
Talent.ability: Requires %BOOST%%LINEBREAK%small ship only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a white %BOOST% action, you may treat it as red to use the [1 %TURNLEFT%] or [1 %TURNRIGHT%] template instead.

Talent.name: Debris Gambit
Talent.ability: Adds %EVADE%%LINEBREAK%small ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a red %EVADE% action, if there is an obstacle at range 0-1, treat the action as white instead.

Talent.name: Elusive
Talent.ability: small ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%While you defend, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to reroll 1 defense die.%LINEBREAK%After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1 %CHARGE%.

Talent.name: Expert Handling
Talent.ability: Requires %BARRELROLL%%LINEBREAK%Adds %BARRELROLL%

Talent.name: Fearless
Talent.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a %FRONTARC% primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender’s %FRONTARC%, you may change 1 of your results to a %HIT% result.

Talent.name: Intimidation
Talent.ability: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

Talent.name: Juke
Talent.ability: small ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s %EVADE% results to a %FOCUS% result.

Talent.name: Lone Wolf
Talent.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to reroll 1 of your dice.

Talent.name: Marksmanship
Talent.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, you may change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result.

Talent.name: Outmaneuver
Talent.ability: While you perform a %FRONTARC% attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

Talent.name: Predator
Talent.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Talent.name: Ruthless
Talent.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1 %HIT% damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a %HIT% result.

Talent.name: Saturation Salvo
Talent.ability: Requires %RELOAD% or %RELOAD%%LINEBREAK%While you perform a %TORPEDO% or %MISSILE% attack, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

Talent.name: Selfless
Talent.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 %CRIT% damage to cancel 1 %CRIT% result.

Talent.name: Squad Leader
Talent.ability: Adds %COORDINATE%%LINEBREAK%While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

Talent.name: Swarm Tactics
Talent.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

Talent.name: Trick Shot
Talent.ability: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

Talent.name: Heroic
Talent.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

Talent.name: Fanatical
Talent.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1 %FOCUS% result to a %HIT% result.

Tech.name: Advanced Optics
Tech.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a %HIT% result.

Tech.name: Pattern Analyzer
Tech.ability: While you fully execute a red maneuver, before the Check Difficulty step, you may perform 1 action.

Tech.name: Targeting Synchronizer
Tech.ability: Requires %LOCK% or %LOCK%%LINEBREAK%While a friendly ship at range 1-2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the %LOCK% attack requirement.

Tech.name: Primed Thrusters
Tech.ability: small ship only%LINEBREAK%While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform %BARRELROLL% and %BOOST% actions even while stressed.

Tech.name: Ferrosphere Paint
Tech.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%After an enemy ship locks you, if you are not in that ship’s %BULLSEYEARC%, that ship gains 1 stress token.

Tech.name: Hyperspace Tracking Data
Tech.ability: Large ship only. First Order only.%LINEBREAK%Setup: Before placing forces, you may choose a number between 0 and 6. Treat your initiative as the chosen value during Setup.%LINEBREAK%After Setup, assign 1 focus or evade token to each friendly ship at range 0-2.

Tech.name: Biohexacrypt Codes
Tech.ability: While you coordinate or jam, if you have a lock on a ship, you may spend that lock to choose that ship, ignoring range restrictions.

Torpedo.name: Proton Torpedoes
Torpedo.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. Change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result.

Torpedo.name: Ion Torpedoes
Torpedo.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. If this attack hits, spend 1 %HIT% or %CRIT% result to cause the defender to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. All remaining %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

Torpedo.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
Torpedo.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. Change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result.

Turret.name: Ion Cannon Turret
Turret.ability: Adds %ROTATEARC%%LINEBREAK%Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 %HIT% or %CRIT% result to cause the defender to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. All remaining %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.
